attributes.action: Address US President on the separation and detainment of immigrants in the USA
attributes.additional_details:
Children heard wailing after being separated from families: https://propub.li/2yoy8QE

All four living First Ladies decry Trump Policy: https://nyti.ms/2M4JBqu
attributes.background: The US government is detaining and separating immigrant families attempting to seek refuge in the United States of America. This issue needs to be addressed by our country’s officials now.
